Product Description

SKG V7 Smart Watch, exercise and health are always under your control

Basic Function：Clock, Date display, Multiple dials, OTA upgradeDaily Activity Monitoring：Heart rate, Sleep, Step-counting, Calorie,Distance, Stress monitoring..etcSports Function: V7 Smart Watch has 14+ exercise modes. These are Outdoor running, Treadmill, Walking, Indoor cycling, Yoga, Cricket, Baseball, Basketball, Table tennis, Badminton, Free training, Fishing, Indoor swimming..etcRemind Function：Call reminder, short message notice, heart rate reminder, App reminder, Alarm reminder, walk reminder, women’s health reminder.1.69 Full Color Large Screen：V7 smartwatch（240*280）APP (Veryfit – Platform for smart wearable and health): Scan the QR code or search “”VeryFit”” to download, Support IOS 9.0+ and Android 6.0+.

Blood Oxygen Monitoring

When you feel tired, breathing, thinking or attention is not concentrated, or after the gym, you can immediately use SKG V7 Smart Watch detect your blood oxygen saturation and adjust your body status.

24/7 Heart Rate Monitoring

Monitoring heart rate is the most accurate method to measure the effectiveness of exercise. The SKG V7 Smart Watch can instantly detect the heart rate, so that you can see your heart rate change during exercise, keep your heart rate in the corresponding area when you exercise, reasonable control of motion intensity.

Sleep Monitoring

SKG V7 Smart Watch uses built-in sensors, system algorithms, large data analysis to detect sleep, use sensor to monitor heart rate, wrist movement, detect you sleep, is sleeping, still sleep, smart statistics, sleep, sleep time Thus let you know your sleep quality.

Breath Training and Stress Monitor

SKG V7 Smart Watch can use heart rate variability data, combined with the corresponding pressure calculation model, estimates your pressure and degree,Reminding you to regulate your mindset when facing stress, and monitoring your stress state at all times. Breathe training can help you release stress and recover you to a normal positive state.

Smart Notification

SKG V7 Smart Watch can inform you of any important information you want to know, even when you are busy, it can timely remind you of every important schedule，for example：Call reminder, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, TMessenger, email, linkedi, messenger, instagram…

Music Control

SKG V7 Smart Watch is equipped with separate music playback, you can switch music, adjust the volume, and freely enjoy music. When exercising in exercise, we can carry music directly through the watch, enjoy the unrestrained sports experience, so that the wonderful melody incentives continue to break through the limit, so that the movement is no longer boring.

Weather Forecast

Use SKG V7 Smart Watch to connect App, pair your watch and your phone, click and push “Weather Forecast”. Let you lift your hand, you can know the weather every day, thus making a corresponding wearing change, just plan your travel.

5ATM Water Resistance

SKG V7 Smart Watch has 5ATM waterproof function, water-resistant depth of 50 meters, very powerful, so that you are indoors, or indoors are useful.

Magnetic Suction Charging

2 Hours Charging Time，8 Continuous Days ，30 Days Stanby，SKG V7 Smart Watch is equipped with a large-capacity battery, sole that you can use it for a long time, without any pressure.

————————————–

App Download：Download and install the “VeryFit” app on the App Store, Google Play or by scanning the QR code below.Pairing:Turn on VeryFit app -> Activate Bluetooth connection on your phone -> Search on the app for the device to pair with (or scan the QR code on the device) -> Finish binding on the app (or on the device).

Tips:

1. A pop-up window will pop up after logging in to the APP, please always allow the APP to access the mobile phone to send and view information, device location information, address book, make calls and manage calls, call records, device information, and other permissions.

2. During the connection process of mobile phone Bluetooth, the mobile phone will pop up a Bluetooth pairing request, please select to allow pairing.

Note:

1. A pop-up window will pop up after logging in to the APP, please always allow the APP to access the mobile phone to send and view information, device location information, address book, make calls and manage calls, call records, device information, and other permissions.

2. During the connection process of mobile phone Bluetooth, the mobile phone will pop up a Bluetooth pairing request, please select to allow pairing.

CARE YOUR HEALTH FROM YOUR WRIST: You can measure your blood oxygen saturation and understand your physical state Ideal for high-intensity sports such as marathon and gym workouts. V7 smartwatche also professionally analyzes sleep quality to help you adjust your sleep habits. It even monitors your 20-minute daily nap
MULTI -FUNCTION SMART WATCH: Equipped with 1.7″HD Extra-large full touch screen. SKG smartwatch can accurately track your health metrics (heart rate, blood oxygen, sleep and stress level). Impressive 8-day battery life between a 2h flash charge.
14 ACTIVITY TRACKING: This fitness sport watch has 14+ sports modes check all-day activities data like steps, distance. Water-resistant up to 50 meters, you can wear the V7 smart watch for swimming and it will record your achievements even under water.
APP SUPPORT FOR ANDROID SAMSUNG IPHONE:The SKG V7 smart watch is compatible with iOS 9.0+ & Android 6 +, Bluetooth 5.2 below smartphones. Download and install “VeryFit” APP.
SKG ALWAYS STAY WITH U: You never want to spend money to buy an unhappy shopping experience. So do we. SKG is committed to providing excellent products and 12 months waranty services .If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us with any problem.

Previous page

  2. SKG is committed to combining user data with intelligent technology, and developing products from multiple perspectives such as wearable technology, ergonomics, and human health big data. Our goal is to make everyone healthier.

    SKG has 946 patents and has won the German Red Dot Award and IF Award. We have a design and development team from the world’s top 500, and will continue to develop more products that can solve human health problems.

  6. SKG has 946 patents and has won the German Red Dot Award and IF Award.

  7. High-tech & modernization

    SKG has a design and development team from the world’s top 500, 10,000 square meters of modern scientific research office space.

  8. How did we get our start?

    According to the research report of the World Health Organization, 95% of the white-collar workers in the world have shoulder and neck pain problems. Since 2007, we have focused on the research and development, design and production of health wear. Our goal is to make everyone healthier. ”

    What makes our products unique?

    talents and modern scientific research office space, so that each of our products is always ahead of the market.

Next page

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}

loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}

submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,

Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)


Amazfit Bip 3 pro–the 2022 upgraded smartwatch that guides you toward a healthier, more active, more connected life. The watch packs a 1.69″ super-sized color screen into its super slim and light body for a clear, exquisite viewing experience. It adds 4 Satellite Positioning Systems to provide faster, more accurate positioning. Powerful battery to deliver up to 14 days of battery life. Built-in 60+ sports modes and Target Pace function, making your exercise at a higher level. With a powerful Water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. Get clear and actionable insights into your health with SpO2 measurement, 24/7 heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, stress detection, and menstrual cycle tracking. Compatible with Android 7.0 and above & IOS 12.0 and above device.
【Big on Screen, Big on Style】Immerse yourself in the 1.69″ super-large and colorful HD display, and see all your incoming text and calls in awesome, expansive quality. Express more of yourself with 50 plus watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos..Water resistance depth:50 meters
【Explore a Big Open World】The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro smart watch supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high precision.
【Big on Power】Got a trip coming up? Unplug yourself for up to two weeks with typical usage. The Bip 3 Pro smartwatch packs a powerful battery into its super slim and light body, so you can pack something more fun than a charger into your case.
【Big on Health】It’s the ultimate device for a healthier, more active life that can provide blood-oxygen saturation measurement, monitoring of heart rate all day & abnormal heart rate warnings, stress levels & sleep tracking, as well as recording female menstrual period.
【Smash Bigger Workout Goals】The Bip 3 Pro fitness watch has 60 plus sports modes, allowing you to get data for all your favorite sports, like walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training.
【Take a Deep Dip with Bip】IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.



Big on Action




4satellite positioning systems

The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high-precision.

60+ Sports Modes

Get data for all your favorite sports, like indoor and outdoor walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training. Take your cardio game to the next level with the watch’s Target Pace function, which lets you set and crush your pace goals.

5 ATM water-Resistance

IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip3 Pro, without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.

Read more

Big on Health




Go Higher with SpO2 Measurement

Feeling worn out? Or adventuring up to higher altitudes? Be smart and use the watch to easily measure your blood-oxygen saturation in as quick as 25 seconds, to quickly understand your physical state.

Follow Your Heart All Day

Keep an eye on the most important muscle in your body. The watch can monitor your heart rate all day, and let you know if it becomes abnormally elevated. You can even check if you’re working out in your goal heart rate zone.

Dream Big, Dream Bip

Follow your dreams through the light, deep and REM sleep stages. The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro can monitor your sleep quality8, so you can rest well enough to keep making the fitness gains you want.

  • Monitor Sleep Stages & Daytime Naps
  • Track Sleep Breathing Quality
  • Get a Sleep Score in the Zepp App

Read more

Big on Versatility




Express More of Yourself

Immerse yourself in the super-large and colorful HD display and express more of yourself with 50+ watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos.

A Smart Partner for Your Phone

Synchronize it with your phone get SMS/phone call/app notifications and control the music playback/ camera of your phone, right on your wrist. The smart watch will also offer Sedentary Reminders, Do Not Disturb, To-Do List, and weather forecast functions, as well as enabling the setting of alarms and stopwatches.

Connect to the Zepp App

The ZeppApp on your phone conducts health and exercise data display and analysis, features a watch face store, provides system updates for your watch, and facilitates smart device management.

Read more

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)

【Your Personal Smart Assistant】Activity tracker (pedometer, calories, distance), heart rate, various sport modes, sleep monitoring.,etc. Get notifications of Call, SMS, and APP messages(THE WATCH CAN NOT MAKE MESSAGES, CALLS or TEXT BACK, Bluetooth distance 8-10 meters), remote control of music and cameras, weather report, sedentary reminder, alarm clock, stopwatch, find phone, call rejection, brightness adjustment, power-saving mode, and other functions to meet your daily needs.
【Long Battery & IP68 Waterproof】The smartwatch only takes 2 hours to charge and can be used for 7-10 days or 30 days standby time, much longer than most traditional watches. The fitness watch is IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when washing hands, in the rain(Note: Do Not use in water more than 100. 40℉, such as showers, saunas, spring, etc).
【Safe Guard Your Health】Advanced HR sensor for accurate and effective heart rate monitoring, helping you better understand your health and making a reasonable adjustment to your lifestyle. Automatic sleep tracking can monitor your sleep status (deep sleep, shallow sleep, awakening) and provide a comprehensive sleep quality analysis to help become healthier. You can view the summary of your status in the fitcloudpro APP.
【Overtake Your Expectations】The AGPTEK smart watch is compatible with most iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher smart phones version to notify you of call, text, email, calendar, and app notifications. The package includes:AGPTEK Smart Watch*1,TPU Silicone Strap*1, Magnetic Charger*1,User Manual*1. If your have any problem, please feel free to contact our customer service via your amazon account.

Product Description

How to connect the Bluetooth smartwatch to make or answer calls on the watch?

You need to download the APP from your phone’s APP store, turn on your bluetooth and open the APP, click “Add A Device” , then find “P42B” to pair it.

Android: After successfully connecting the APP, the mobile phone will automatically pop up “Pair”or”OK” in 5 seconds to request a Bluetooth call. It does not need to be set on the mobile phone separately. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

iPhone: After the APP is successfully bound, you need to open the Phone settings → Bluetooth on the phone, find Bluetooth named “P42B_Phone” in the list, and click “Pair”. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

Wwzzey smart watch is a best choice as an exquisite gift for Birthday, Christmas, Wedding Anniversary, Valentine’s day, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and other special days etc.

Main Functions: Make/Answer calls, Pedometer, Heart rate Monitor, Spo2 Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Workout modes; Alarm Clock; Wake Up Gesture; Remote Camera; 150+ Watch Faces; Time Format; Information Sync; Reminders; Find Device; Sports; Weather; Music Control & Player; AI Voice; Breathe; Exercise; Game; Flashlight, ect.

Stylish Smart Watch for Women and Men

Bluetooth version: Bluetooth 4.0

Don’t missing any notifications

After connecting the watch with your phone, you can get calls, receive SMS and APP messages (Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter…), calendar, weather and other smartphone app alerts, and you won’t miss any important information.

Ai Voice

Connect the mobile phone Bluetooth, you can voice control the mobile phone to reply to the message, check the weather, etc.

The AI voice function making it possible to complete tasks without having to grab your phone out of your pocket book.

Camera Remotely

Just open the App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch, making it easier to record your happy moments with your friends and family.

Excellent Daily Partner

This fitness tracker watch not only can accurately provide 24/7 Heart Rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring, but also many practical features, such as alarm clocks, weather forecast, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder, helping you have a healthier lifestyle. And it’s a good choice as gift for your friends and family.

A Variety of Sport Modes

Our fitness tracker has 8 sport modes： Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. It can meet your daily exercise needs basically.

Long Battery Life

iOS Android smart watch is equipped with a 235mAh battery, just need to be charged for 1.5 to 2 hours, can be used for 2-3 days bluetooth call. And it Supports 20 days standby time.

【2022 Fashionable Bluetooth Call Smart Watch】Wwzzey smart watch allows you to answer or dial calls anywhere, anytime. Our bluetooth smartwatch come with fashionable appearance and comfortable silicone bracelet, fit your wrist well and more nicer and safety , easy to wear and take off, and you can adjust the length of the band. It is a ideal choice as a gift for men and womenin 2022.
【1.7 inch Full Touch Screen & Customize Personalized Dial】High texture metal watch frame with 1.7-inch HD full touch screen and excellent image quality design brings you a better user experience. And our smartwatch has more than 150+ different watch faces, you can choose different dials from APP’s market according to festival, your mood or clothes. And you can also customize your watch faces with your personal photos, new look for everyday.
【Push Real-time Information to Your Wrist】The smart watch with bluetooth call can connect to iOS8.0 and Android4.4 phone via Bluetooth 4.0, and you can answer or dial calls anywhere, and get calendar, weather and SNS (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Twitter,etc.) notifications on display. It will be very practical when you are unconvenient to take your phone out or you don’t want to miss anything important.
【Multifunctional Health Tracking】This fitness watch can measure your steps, walking distance and burning calories precisely in real time, and can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your sleep, and help you better understand your health and create a health plan. Moreover, the watch not only has alarm/breathing training/sedentary reminder/drinking water reminder and other functions, but also can control music, control a camera remotely to record your happy moments with friends more easily.
【IP68 Waterproof & 8 Sports Models】Our health tracker is completely dust-proof and waterproof, you can wear it in washing hands, walking in the rain, bathing or swimming and so on, it can meet your daily needs completely. And the fitness tracker also has 8 sport modes : Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. Pick it to track your real-time data during daily fitness and make exercise easier.
【100% SATISFACTION OF AFTER-SELL SERVICE】You can easily learn how to use it by following our user instructions. Wwzzey offers 7×24 hours customer service and 12 moths after-sales service, support for replacement, and refund. Pls feel free to contact us if you have any issues. function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $119.99 - $89.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:39 UTC – Details)


Amazfit GTS 4 Mini is an ideal solution for your health and fitness management. Easy health management with 24H Heart Rate, SpO₂ & Stress Monitoring, Sleep Quality tracking, and enabling Test 3 Health Metrics in 1 Tap. Come with 120 sport modes & Smart Recognition of 7 sports to make your exercise at a higher level. Supports 5 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves with high precision. A fully-optimized battery management system provides up to 15 days of battery life. Make daily life a breeze with a wide selection of helpful features, including Amazon Alexa, text, call & App Notifications, sedentary reminders, SMS & Call Quick Replies, Bluetooth Phone Music Control, Bluetooth Phone Camera Control, and More…Compatible with Android 7.0 and above & IOS 12.0 and above device.
【Position with Precision】Amazfit GTS 4 Mini smart watch supports 5 satellite positioning systems to help you make the most of your journeys into the great outdoors, and uses circularly-polarized antenna technology to improve positioning performance and accuracy..Water resistance depth:50 meters
【Alexa Built-in & Powerful Zepp OS】Easily set an alarm, ask a question, get a translation and more, with the Amazon Alexa feature of the watch. Packed with smooth & low power-consuming Zepp OS, which features over 10 mini apps, including the Home Connect third-party app, to help enhance your daily life.
【Health Made Effortless】Easily test your heart rate, blood-oxygen saturation and stress level simultaneously with a single tap of the smartwatch, for a result in as quick as 45 seconds. Also, this watch provides in-depth monitoring of sleep quality to keep you on top of your health.
【120 plus Sports Modes & Smart Recognition】Walking, running, cycling, yoga, and more. Whichever activity makes you challenge yourself, you’ll likely find a sports mode for it on the fitness tracker watch. And Jump into action quickly with smart recognition of 7 Sports.
【Swim with Confidence】A water-resistance grade of 5 ATM means the smart watch can resist the equivalent of up to 50 meters’ water pressure. And whenever you fancy a trip to the pool or the beach, the watch’s Pool Swimming and Open Water Swimming sports modes can scientifically track your swimming data.
【Long-lasting Endurance】This ultra-compact smartwatch packs a mega-powerful 270 mAh battery, bringing 15 days of endurance on typical usage and up to 45 days of battery life on battery saver mode.



Easily test your heart rate, blood oxygen saturation (SpO₂), and stress level simultaneously, with a single tap of the watch, for a result in as quick as 45 seconds.

And to keep you on top of your game, the watch will send helpful health reminders for:

  • Abnormally High or Low Heart Rates
  • Abnormally Low SpO₂ Levels
  • Abnormally High-Stress Levels
  • Stress-reducing Breathing Exercise



Dare to Dream

Track your sleep quality through the light and deep sleep stages, and even the REM stage – where dreaming is said to occur, as well as monitor sleep breathing quality at night.

PeakBeats Workout Status Algorithm

The watch is equipped with a self-developed motion algorithm, which assesses specialized data such as maximum oxygen uptake (VO2 Max), full recovery time, training load and training effect. Stay informed of performance aspects that can affect recovery, progress and exercise capacity, and track your performance data more professionally.

120+ Sports Modes & Smart Recognition

The watch can track sports data for more than 120 different sports, to satisfy your needs, whatever sport you love.

Also, jump into action quickly with smart recognition of Walking / Indoor walking / Outdoor running / Treadmill / Outdoor cycling / Elliptical / Rowing machine.

Read more




PAI Health Assessment System

A PAI score is calculated by processing data about your heart rate and other complex health information with an algorithm. This single-value score provides a customized health evaluation for each user based on their unique health data, offering everyone a personalized experience.

Strong & Precise Global Positioning

The Amazfit GTS4 Mini supports 5 satellite positioning systems and uses patented circularly-polarized antenna technology to improve positioning performance and accuracy. Track your moves through the great outdoors with high-precision.

Smart AI Assistant

You can talk to Alexa on your Amazfit GTS 4 Mini. Ask questions, get translations, set alarms and timers, create shopping lists, check the weather, control your smart home devices and more.

Read more




1.65″ HD AMOLED Display

The HD full color AMOLED display features a higher resolution than the previous generation with 336×384 pixels and 309 ppi. It will always look stunning and display your content in crystal clear clarity.

Ultra-slim & Light Design

With a light 19.1g weight, a thickness of 9.15mm (without the sensor base), and a skin-friendly silicone strap, the GTS 4 Mini allows you to enjoy the lightness of time.

The ultra-slim and light body is complemented by an elegant metallic middle frame, made of aluminum alloy, for a watch that never compromises in comfort or style.

50+ Watch Faces

The Amazfit GTS 4 Mini can be personalized to reflect your unique character. With over 50 watch faces to choose from, each of which having a matching Always-on Display, you can make sure you’re always in-style and able to see the interface you like. Or, to make the watch face truly yours, upload your own photos to the background and focus on what you care about by customizing your widgets with the custom modular dial. There’s also a selection of 1 animated watch face to give your watch a futuristic and fun look.

Read more

Product Description

All-day Heart Rate Monitoring

The advanced built-in heart rate sensor will continuously measure your heart rate all day (every 5 mins). You can also manually track your real-time heart rate on your watch or intuitively check the heart rate graph in the app.

Fitness Tracker with Multiple Sports Modes

Accurately record all-day activities like steps, calories burned, miles walked, exercise duration. This watch has 9 exercise modes, including running, walking, bicycle, dynamic cycling, hike, climbing, treadmill, Yoga.

You can also activate GPS function of your smart phone and track the routes you have traveled during workout via the app.

Receive Notifications on the Watch

With the watch connected to the app, it will vibrate to notify you when your phone receives incoming calls, text, SNS messages from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc. You can view the messages or decline the calls on the watch directly. Keep you informed in time of anything important. (Please note: not support answer calls or reply message.)

Music Control and Practical Tools

Once the smartwatch is connected to your phone, you can use the watch to control your smart phone’s music (Skip, Play/Pause music).

This sports watch also supports 10 alarm clocks, sedentary reminder, stop watch, timer, breath training, menstrual cycle tracking and other practical tools.

Outstanding Battery Life & Adjustable Brightness Levels

When fully-charged, you can relax and enjoy up to 7 days extra-long battery life or 30 days standby time. This watch has 3 different levels of brightness, so you can choose a suitable level for different surroundings, such as in the sun or at night.

IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch

This smartwatch meets IP68 waterproof standard, which can withstand all your daily activities. You can wear it when wash your hands, run in the rain, or take part in intensive workouts. (Please note: It can’t track your swimming data)

iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices No need App iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices

【Accurate Fitness Tracker with 9 Sport Modes】 This fitness tracker watch can accurately provide 24hrs heart rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring and female cycle tracking. 9 sports modes are optional, including various outdoor and indoor activities, allow you to get the real-time stats during your workouts on the watch. You can also connect it to smartphone’s GPS to track all your workout routes and distance traveled during exercise.
【Smart Watch Compatible with iPhone Android Phones】- This smart watch is compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher smart phones(Not for PC or tablet). Pair the smart watch to your phone and receive all incoming calls, messages, apps notifications straight to your smartwatch including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Whatsapp, and more. (Please note: only supports receiving calls and messages).
【24/7 Heart Rate Monitor & Sleep Tracker】 This smart tracker watch will monitor your heart rate every 5 minutes all day; It also detect and track your sleep, and analyze your sleep quality automatically.(deep sleep, light sleep, and awake time). By connecting the smartwatch to your phone, the app will provide detailed heart rate chart and comprehensive analysis of your sleep quality to help you stay active and stay healthy:)
【Long-lasting battery & IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch】 When fully-charged, this watch can last for up to 7 days or 30 days standby time. With IP68 waterproof, this fitness watch can meet the waterproof requirements of your daily activities such as washing hands or working out in the rain with it. Whether it’s sweat or a small splash, just handle it with ease.
【Smart Watch for Women Men with More Practical Features】 This watch can fit for 6.2-9.2 inch wrist, suits for both women and men. It has many practical features, such as female menstrual cycle tracker, alarm clocks, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder. It’s a also very good choice as gift for your friends and family members to help them stay motivated all day!

GRV

Combining wearable technology with sports & health!

Previous page

  2. GRV is a company that mainly designs and produces wearable technology. Our products are exported to Europe and US. The main products are smart watches, Fitness Activity trackers and wireless earphones. We use the industry’s top technology and design and more scientific and accurate induction algorithms, to bring trustworthy sports and health data to every customer, so that every user can find suitable and trustworthy products in GRV.

  3. Suitable for men and women

    The appearance of the watch is versatile, and it is also very suitable for men with large wrists.

  4. Heart rate monitor

    GRV smart watches use the latest infrared sensors, which can read your heart rate accurately and quickly, and monitor 24 hours a day.

  5. Fashion and beautiful

    GRV’s watch design is very fashionable and beautiful, it is a small accessory for you to match

  6. Activity Tracker

    Accurately record your heart rate, calories and steps to help you understand yourself better

  7. No bluetooth fitness tracker

    This fitness tracker that does not need to be connected to a mobile phone and does not require an app, very easy to use.

  8. True wireless earbuds

    GRV wireless earbuds adopts the latest Bluetooth technology, and the sound quality is clear and stable.

Product Description

Tips: Please download the APP and connect it before using the watch, need to link two bluetooths. Please refer to the below.

MVEFOIT Bluetooth Call Smart Watch Make and Receive Calls, Smartphone Smart Notification, AI Voice Control Smart Watch Reply to Text Messages, Make Calls, Open APP. Smart Bracelet on Your Wrist.

Monitor Daily Exercise Data: Steps, Calories, Distances, Minutes, Multiple Sport Modes, GPS Recording Exercise Route.

Heart Rate/ Blood Oxygen/ Sleep Monitor Watch, Automatically Monitor Your Health and Analyze Sleep Quality.

Size Suitable for Most People, Precise Body Design, More Comfortable to Wear, Simple and Stylish.

Smart Watch Compatible with Android 4.4 or above/iOS 8.0 or above Smartphone.

Drink Water Reminder / Sedentary Reminder.

Relax Games, Alarm Clock, Flashlight…………

More Functions Take You to Experience the Intelligent Life of Science and Technology.

Heart Rate / Blood Oxygen / Sleep Monitor

More Functions with Smart Watch

AI Voice Control

Send SMS, make calls, and open mobile APPs through AI voice to make life smarter

Smart Reminder

Smart watch preview calls, messages, facebook, instagram, TikTok, Twitter and other APP reminders

Drinking Reminder&Sedentary Reminder

Smart reminder for healthy life: Set reminders for drinking water or sedentary time, and the smart watch will remind you on time

DIY Watch Face

The watch has its own watch dial, and there are 150+ kinds of dials to choose from in the APP. You can also choose the pictures from your own smart phone album.

Music Control&Camera Control

Smart watch control phone camera to take photos, music switching/pause

Real Time Weather

After the smart watch is connected to the APP, it synchronizes the local weather conditions in real time, one of the essential tools for daily travel

【1.7 Inch Large Screen Smart Watch】Smart watch for women men with 1.7 inch Super Retina HD display, 245*285 HD resolution, better color saturation, the picture quality is more delicate and clear, bring you more open visual enjoyment. In Addition, 150+ watch dials can be used, and you can define your own photo album.Be yourself better from a watch.
【 Health Management】Fitness watch has a built-in enhanced biosensor chip that integrates optics, structure and algorithm, uses PPG photoelectric sensor principles to monitor accurately. It supports 7*24 hour heart rate monitoring to protect your health. Besides, our smart watch gold also supports blood oxygen and sleep monitoring, which will help you better understand your health on a deep level.
【Your Exclusive Sports Life】Accurately record your daily activities like number of steps, distance, calories burned. It helps you track daily activities with real-time stats on smart watch men and get good fitness effects. Supports multiple sports modes, such as swimming, running, cycling, etc. You can intuitively read your exercise data on the watch. Smart watch for iphone compatible with android 4.4 and above, iOS 8.0 and above smartphone.
【20+ Convenient Functions】Bluetooth calls, music playing, heart rate measurement, blood oxygen measurement, sleep monitor, breathing training, sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder, SMS text or SNS notifications (Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, etc.), games, theater mode, weather forecast, Camera control, alarm clock, waterproof, 8 sports modes, stopwatch, fitness tracker (steps, calories, km) etc. Make your life healthier and your work more efficient.

MVEFOIT

This is a brand that specializes in selling watches. We have a professional factory, dedicated to R&D and innovation, leading fashion
